name: OIA_Coronary_Arterial_Revascularization
title: OIA_Coronary_Arterial_Revascularization
purpose: (Clinical Focus: CPT codes indicating Coronary/Arterial Revascularization),(Data Element Scope: Codes used as risk factors for the solution contained in patients problem list and/or claims data),(Inclusion Criteria: All code(s) pertinent to  Coronary/Arterial Revascularization),(Exclusion Criteria: None)
